name: Between a Bot and a Hard Place
name_original: Between a Bot and a Hard Place
description:
Created during the GMTK 2020 48h Game Jam. Theme: Out Of Control.

Synopsis:

The mainframe AI has gone rogue and trapped the chief scientist in the production hall! Avoid getting squashed by the crushers and use the maintenance bot to fix control panels before everything goes out of control!

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow keys to Move
  • W / Up arrow when standing near console to decrease danger level
  • Y / Z / Shift to switch characters

Credits:

Art & Game Concept - Galit "Shoze" Weisberg

Programming - Eilam “Aki” Gilboa

Sound Design - Yuval Bar-On

Scientist "Squash" Animation - Yael Givon

Font - Wheaton

Camera shake code based on work by KidsCanCode
